One file always corrupts when I open CS:GO and I get a VAC authentication error mid game. I have tried various fixes but every time after I verify Integrity of Game Files It shows that one file was corrupted.
I understand that the problem is on my end but I also haven't been able to fix the issue with the instructions you have provided for this error.
I'm tired of trying to fix it and I hate that there isn't just a simple solution. I really don't want to make a clean windows installation.
